Windy Craggy WC-6 Up Gradient of Falls to Tats Glacier

Site WC-6 Red Creek up gradient of waterfall into Tats Glacier. Part of Windy Craggy Surface Sampling Project. Tatshenshini-Alsek  BC Parks. See Windy Craggy Exploration Site BC Can: 2016 Mon Report on Ecocat
